entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
